title: Enterprise-Grade
description: OpenUI5 follows open standards and includes powerful development concepts, efficient tools, as well as a rich set of UI controls.

title: Responsive on All Devices
description: No need to worry about device specifics! UI5 apps and controls run on smartphones, tablets and desktop browsers.

title: Free and Open Source
description: OpenUI5 is a JavaScript UI Framework released by SAP under the Apache 2.0 license. It's open for contributions and feedback!
